title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions
While pasta cooks, cut bacon into small pieces and fry in a large pan until crispy
In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan cheese and black pepper
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain the spaghetti
Add hot pasta to the pan with bacon and toss to combine
Remove pan from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce
Season with additional black pepper and parmesan, serve immediately

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka masala spice for at least 2 hours
Grill or pan-fry marinated chicken until cooked through and slightly charred
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté garlic and ginger until fragrant
Add tomato sauce and remaining tikka masala spice, simmer for 10 minutes
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for another 10 minutes
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with basmati rice or naan bread

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef with fresh toppings in crispy or soft tortillas.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Drain excess fat and add taco seasoning with water according to package directions
Simmer for 5 minutes until mixture thickens
Warm taco shells in oven or tortillas on a skillet
Fill each shell with seasoned beef
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream
Serve with salsa on the side

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and thoroughly dry romaine lettuce, then chop into bite-sized pieces
If making dressing from scratch, blend garlic, anchovies, lemon juice, and parmesan
Place lettuce in a large bowl
Add Caesar dressing and toss until evenly coated
Add croutons and most of the parmesan, toss gently
Transfer to serving plates and top with remaining parmesan
Garnish with black pepper and lemon wedges

title: Pad Thai
summary: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, peanuts, egg, and tamarind sauce.
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 30 minutes, then drain
Mix tamarind paste, fish sauce, and brown sugar to make the sauce
Heat oil in a wok, scramble eggs and set aside
Stir-fry shrimp until pink, then remove from wok
Add noodles and sauce to wok, toss for 2-3 minutes
Return eggs and shrimp to wok, add bean sprouts and green onions
Toss everything together, garnish with peanuts and serve with lime wedges

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C) with pizza stone if available
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a border for the crust
Arrange mozzarella and tomato slices on top
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden and cheese is bubbly
Remove from oven, top with fresh basil leaves, slice and serve

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips and a hint of vanilla.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
In a separate bowl, cream together butter and both sugars until fluffy
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract
Gradually stir in flour mixture until just combined
Fold in chocolate chips
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto baking sheets
Bake for 9-11 minutes until golden brown, cool on wire rack

title: Greek Moussaka
summary: Layered eggplant casserole with spiced meat sauce and creamy béchamel topping.
instructions: Slice eggplants, salt them, and let sit for 30 minutes to remove bitterness
Rinse and pat dry, then fry eggplant slices in olive oil until golden
Brown ground meat with onion and garlic, add tomatoes, cinnamon, salt and pepper
Simmer meat sauce for 20 minutes until thickened
In a baking dish, layer eggplant, meat sauce, then repeat
Pour béchamel sauce over the top and sprinkle with parmesan
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 45 minutes until golden and bubbly

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Fresh fish and vegetables wrapped in seasoned rice and nori seaweed.
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package directions and let cool slightly
Mix rice vinegar and sugar, fold into warm rice
Place nori sheet on bamboo rolling mat, shiny side down
Spread thin layer of rice on nori, leaving 1 inch at the top
Arrange fish, cucumber, and avocado in a line across the center
Roll tightly using the mat, pressing gently to seal
Slice into 8 pieces with a sharp wet knife
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger

title: French Onion Soup
summary: Rich beef broth with caramelized onions, topped with crusty bread and melted cheese.
instructions: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat
Add onions and cook slowly for 30-40 minutes until deeply caramelized
Add wine and scrape up any browned bits from the bottom
Pour in beef broth, add bay leaves and thyme, simmer for 30 minutes
Toast French bread slices until crispy
Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls
Top each with toasted bread and generous amount of Gruyere cheese
Broil until cheese is melted and bubbly, serve immediately

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful mix of crisp vegetables tossed in a savory soy-ginger sauce.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger to make the sauce
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat
Add broccoli and carrots first, stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add bell pepper and snap peas, stir-fry for 2 more minutes
Pour sauce over vegetables and toss to coat evenly
Cook for 1-2 minutes until vegetables are crisp-tender
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve over rice

title: Banana Bread
summary: Moist and sweet bread made with ripe bananas and warm spices.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan
In a large bowl, mix mashed bananas with melted butter
Stir in sugar, beaten egg, and vanilla extract
Sprinkle baking soda and salt over the mixture and stir
Add flour and cinnamon, mix until just combined (don't overmix)
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan
Bake for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean
Cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto wire rack
